title: Have you heard the latest on climate change?
body:
Somehow I doubt that you have.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/9wGQN8Wm-image.png)

They have changed the models but the changes won't get published until 2024.

Until then we get the chickens with their heads cut off running around talking about how the sky is falling, but with the wrong numbers in the models.
Smdh.

Now, I agree we need to get off of oil.
We can grow whatever oils and fuels we need on the wide open spaces of farm land currently paid to lay idle.

Hemp can give us everything that oil gives us, except the $$ per pound that we could have because we grew some hemp in the back yard.

Nearly everybody has a back yard.
Hemp is a weed.

Seems like a no brainer, to me.

Anyway, we are in a changing time in the upper reaches of physics.

If your data is outdated, so is your opinion.

Lucky for us, @jang brings us a [daily report](https://steempeak.com/nature/@jang/space-weather-news-deadly-earthquake-major-snow-top-science-news-or-s0-news) that will put us into
root_title: Have you heard the latest on climate change?

author: freebornangel
title: If you don't upvote things you don't like hearing, you don't support free speech.
body:
If you do not upvote viewpoints that clash with your own, you do not support free speech.

Unless you upvote ideas that just make you want to rip the heads off of morons and look into their necks, you do not support free speech.

You support speech that coincides with your view of the world.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/0KARlCdy-image.png)
[sbp](https://library.duke.edu/rubenstein/sites/default/files/rubenstein/bingham/collections/baskin/300x300/1930s---Goldman_Letters---D.jpg)

If you only reward ideas that you agree with, you will end up in an echo chamber looking for a corner to ponder in.

Instead of finding new ways to look at old ideas, you will just continue to circle the maypole of ideas that you already have.

I don't know if you have looked at the concept, dear reader, but it is not easy to have an original thought.
I thought I had one, but danged if some russian didn't already think it 150 years ago.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak
root_title: If you don't upvote things you don't like hearing, you don't support free speech.

[Granddad's Wonderful Book of Electricity](https://archive.org/details/GRANDDADSWONDERFULBOOKOFELECTRICITY)

Maybe you won't come out a re-incarnated Nikolai Tesla, but you can build one his coils from scraps laying around the house, and some wire.

You may learn the secrets he knew, if you repeat the processes he pioneered.
You may not.

Either way, let's get to the information at hand.

author: freebornangel
title: It is looking like my run may be coming to an end.
body:
But, don't freak out, dear reader, I will still be here, just not posting as much.

I don't know for sure that I can't get some work done, but I do know for sure that my access to a keyboard is diminishing.

It's not everyday that I can get to a desktop to tap out these fine informative posts.
I have to tap them out as I can.
With the onset of winter, that will be less.

It's not a big deal, when I can get to a keyboard I will knock out a couple and schedule them with @steempeak's handy scheduler.

Time will tell.

Until then, enjoy the extra steemtoshi's that I leave on the table.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/vO74KrIk-image.png)
root_title: It is looking like my run may be coming to an end.

You are living on the backs of poor people everywhere.

How do you figure that most of the world lives on less than 2usd a day?
Why does labor in Uganda not pay as much as labor in Munich?
How can corporations sell stuff where the widget's dollar price is a week's wage?

This is all set up, and managed, by the banksters.
Their economy is a centrally planned one.
They determine the price of oil.
They determine the price of silver.
They determine how much labor in Uganda it takes to equal a pittance in Munich.

Why would they change that?
Would you

author: freebornangel
title: A temporary reprieve.
body:
One last day in the upper 50's, so not wanting to get the rep of being a lazy bum, despite any tendencies towards such, I forked the moly horse and rode.

It was an unusually windless ride.
Normally, out here on the plains, the wind is a constant 20 miles an hour out of the south.

When it turns to the north, look out.
Arctic air comes from that way.
It comes down out of Denver and heads to Little Rock.

As I travel north first, then return to the south, I guess I shouldn't get to hopeful that the return ride will go as easy as the ride here.

But, nobody is here to listen to my problems.

Let me tell you about my buddy's!

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/dj8xBnJr-image.png)

He had an ex-girlfriend turned roomate finally get enough of her 30yo monkey's bs.

The monkey finally wore out his welcome.
I stopped talking to him a couple years ago.
He does best to make like I don't exist.

Before he went, he invited all his new homeless friends to bunk in his room.
At times, t
root_title: A temporary reprieve.

author: freebornangel
title: Survival Saturday #29: Homemade High Temperature Indicators!
body:
Little did you know, dear reader, you can make most of the tools you will need for your electrical lab yourself.

If you have the most basic workshop, you can crank these out as needed by your neighbors.

What blacksmith wouldn't need one for his shop?

When the sun pops off a [micronova,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B_zfMyzXqfI&feature=youtu.be
) this knowhow is going to be very valuable as we reconstruct society.

It's only a matter of time.

[Get your knowhow here!](https://archive.org/details/GRANDDADSWONDERFULBOOKOFELECTRICITY)

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/kBHyO9Em-image.png)

As we move past crapitalism, making things in your home workshop will increasingly become how we get things.
Why pay a corporation when Kenny the good neighbor already makes these things?

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/PBepxbD5-image.png)

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/dQ25X1NR-image.png)

author: freebornangel
title: Ever seen a Stincy wet dream?
body:
Well, here we are, dear reader.

Very early on, before stinc dropped below 80% reliability in my book, the buzz was that they wanted to create a place that content could go on the chain, be voted to exorbitant reward levels, and not be seen by very many people.
They wanted a work around to abusive posting going on trending.
Not to stop the abuse, but just to take it off the front page.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/3ZK0I7ab-image.png)
[sbp](https://media.breitbart.com/media/2015/05/Mexico-43-640x428.jpg)

They kneecapped us with linear rewards and went on two year walkabout, and then bailed.
Now we know what has been done in the interim.

They created the place to put crappy content that won't everybody see it.

### Communities!

# All hail, Stinc!

[The dream](https://steempeak.com/steemdev/@adept/will-steemit-complete-project-xanadu-s-vision-of-what-the-internet-should-be) is coming to life!


![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/qBd
root_title: Ever seen a Stincy wet dream?

author: freebornangel
title: CalBen Soap Co.
body:
I don't know if you think about it much, dear reader, but cancer has gone up as chemical cleaners have proliferated in the culture.

We are just now finding out that [microplastics](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2468584417300119) are even a thing.
We have very little data to know what they will do.

You can reduce this exposure by buying quality products.
They are not cheaper than the chemical cleaners, but they are cheaper than cancer.

To that end, let me introduce [CalBen Soap Co.](https://www.calbenpuresoap.com/)

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/lpNAVIzt-image.png)

I bought the three year supply some years ago.
Most of it got left in my rv when Mexico deported me.
I'm betting it is still there.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/p9uL7PP6-image.png)

Anyways, this soap is made the same way since 1947.
For those of you in the know, you know that after the war, the Nazi's took over.
Not the Heil Hitler Nazi's, bu
root_title: CalBen Soap Co.

title: Alert! Alert! Anti-fa has a message for you!
body:
As you know, dear reader, I like to get my news from a variety of places.

One of them comes direct to my inbox under the guise of:

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/uT7cmmD2-image.png)

Refuse Fascism

You can probably find them in any number of places, fedbook, tweeter, etc, but so far, I have not found them on steem.

If you have influence with those folks, drop a hint, eh?

>Supporter,

>In an historic vote yesterday, the House of Representatives impeached the fascist in the White House. 
This makes Donald Trump only the third president in U.S. history to be impeached. 
Trump responded by doubling down on his fascist threats and rejection of the entire lawful impeachment process.

>The question that confronts us all is: 
>## What will we, the people, do?

>The divisions at the top of society are extremely sharp. 
The situation is highly volatile and unpredictable. 
And the potential consequences of how this unfolds can impact not just the U.S., but the whole world.

>

>[(FTP)](https://thefreethoughtproject.com/man-seizure-service-dog-killed-police/) — Monday night, Larry Massey — likely warned by his service dog — pulled over to the side of the road before going into a seizure. 
When Massey would come to after losing consciousness, his service dog Butch would be dead — shot and killed by an Okeechobee police officer.

>According to police, they received a call around 11:59 p.m. on Monday. 
The caller stated there was an unconscious man in his car on the side of the road. 
When the two officers, identified by the city only as Rojas and Daigneault, responded to the vehicle, they found Massey inside in the midst of a seizure along with his service dog.

>P

body:
Most religions are pretty closed minded.

You got to wear the funny hat, or you get no respect.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/gGQfIDmi-image.png)
[sbp](https://i.pinimg.com/736x/66/e4/5b/66e45b414764d5203f53b6a5cdff2816--conscience-sarcasm.jpg)

They are quaint like that.

But you, dear reader, and me, we think a little different.

We need a religion that can be demonstrably proven to exist.
If your religion doesn't explain what you see, and doesn't predict what could happen, what good is it?

So, in pursuit of that.

You can do it on paper, you can do it in a pdf document.

author: freebornangel
title: One more gloriously globally warmed day!
body:
Not anywhere near a record, mind you, but it is looking blissfully less cold in my neck of the woods.
Not that we got that many trees left, either.

So, I beat feet to the library to get on a public computer.

Just so I wouldn't miss a Tuesday on getting out the message Tuesday.

You got a message you need to get out?
You got steempeak, and can schedule your message for a Tuesday?

Join us, maybe somebody will bring cookies,...
![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/xGvr4Qbf-image.png)
[sbp](https://riotimesonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/Freedom.jpg)

Well, welcome aboard!

Here is my message for this Tuesday.

# Keep working, stop paying!

or, as they say in #yelling!

## KEEP WORKING, STOP PAYING!

It really is as simple as that, dear reader.

When we workers figure out that we can simply continue to deliver our products to the dock for pick up by the delivery guys, gals, and drones, the world will not fall apart.
In fact, it would go on without a hitch.
The only folks
root_title: One more gloriously globally warmed day!

title: Survival Saturday #31:  A little back story on Kurt Saxon
body:
This fella does a pretty fair job of making an overview of what Kurt did, and was about.

I met him after he had retired to Arkansas.
He lived in the next town over.
I wish I had known then what I found out years later, I could have used this knowledge to much greater advantage.

Anyway, this is a good article.

You can get the full story [here.](https://archive.org/details/ManualForMayhemKurtSaxonArticle)

I used to love listening to his [radio show](https://archive.org/details/OurFutureLiesInThePastAlternate) on [WWCR](http://www.wwcr.com/).

Don't miss your chance, dear reader, to hop a ride on your hero

author: freebornangel
title: Freedom Tuesday #28
body:
The boss still needs you more than you need him, dear reader.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/tFCFdnXG-image.png)

If the boss takes a day off, things still get done.
If the president didn't show up to work today, who cares?

The people at the top don't do much of the work.
Much of the work they do actually do, we can mostly do without.

The shareholders absolutely do none of the work.

Sure, sure, this hierarchial structure you refer to as a job might not exist, but there are other 'jobs'.

It's not like crapitalism can exist without the actual labor, now can it?

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/WdkvSW4Q-image.png)

If the rest of the workers of the world went on strike, [like they do in France,](https://youtu.be/pkqvX6aaJE0) why, this system wouldn't last a week.

The bosses would all hide in their [hidey holes.](https://www.zerohedge.com/news/2016-04-14/what-coming-elite-feverishly-building-survival-bunkers-fear-uprising-99)

The
root_title: Freedom Tuesday #28

author: freebornangel
title: Patrick Lancaster, journalist, war correspondent, steemizen.
body:
Patrick Lancaster has an account here.
@patricklancaster

He tried to give us a go, but there just was too much on the plates at the top for him to get recognized for what he is doing for all of us.

To our eternal shame, imo.

While the trending page was going to latte art, semi-pretty traveler girlz, circle jerks, and bid bot owners, Patrick was on the front lines of a war reporting his experiences.

https://youtu.be/1MtGMMzfX4E

## Well, Patrick, I'm here to keep you remembered.

Look around, steemizen!
You see anybody else reporting what is happening from the frontlines of the war on freedom?

Those people voted to be a country unto themselves.

They speak a different language and are only included in Ukraine because somebody not them drew the lines on the map.

Does rule by force preclude this outcome?
It sure looks that way.

https://youtu.be/NbRAvkKepog

Do you accept the mainstream version of russia bad, 'murica good?

Do you even realize that the man your momma calls obama is responsible for the Don
root_title: Patrick Lancaster, journalist, war correspondent, steemizen.

title: Look out!! A steemizen has made it good!
body:
Give it up for @kafkanarchy84!

He left us, but he is doing just fine!

https://news.bitcoin.com/youtube-christmas-purge-has-content-creators-pointing-to-these-alternate-platforms/

I've had [interactions](https://steemit.com/anarchy/@freebornangel/news-from-the-front-lines-of-the-push-back-against-crapitalism#@freebornangel/re-kafkanarchy84-re-freebornangel-re-kafkanarchy84-re-freebornangel-re-kafkanarchy84-re-freebornangel-news-from-the-front-lines-of-the-push-back-against-crapitalism-20180720t021917091z) with him.
And it does appear that he dropped 'anarchist' from his self labeling.

He got in a tussle with [this guy.](@adamkokesh)
It escalated quickly.
Flamed out.
Everybody has probably moved on.

For those of us watching from the outside, it serves as warning about being careful who you get involved with.

I think Kafka should have gotten more support from us, he was quite brave/assertive in outing the poor behavior of a well known personality.

He did us a favor, there.

I don't think got proper respe

If we simply put our labor out on the market, help the neighbor get a garden going, do the grocery shopping for the grandma next door, repair her roof and mow her lawn while we are at it, if we send our products into the production/delivery stream without requiring tit for tat trades to 'settle the books', we can all float along on the excess with no lack of anything.

Instead of grandma having to

Maybe they just don't blog.
Or, want to pay somebody to blog here.
Whatever, go by and show them some love, eh?

author: freebornangel
title: Just another crappy day in paradise!
body:
Here it is Sunday, one more Sunday in a long line of 'em.

Lucky for me, it is happening on a warm day in January.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/S0tOJCE8-image.png)

It has been very warm here, this year.
In fact, since I have come back from mexico in '13 we have had  4 of the warmest winters on record.

That is ominous, to me.
What happens when the pendulum swings the other way?

When do we get hammered to bring our numbers back in line with the average?

I know it is going to happen.

I'm hoping to be in mexico for that.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/SWCnYcJR-image.png)

I know while I was away we got hit by one of the worst ice storms in a long time.
Two feet of snow in streets.
Brrr.
Glad I missed it.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/lV3V2ic2-image.png)

So, if you got any influence on the price, it would be nice if you could moon it before next winter.
Or, even better, before the next
root_title: Just another crappy day in paradise!

title: Freedom Tuesday #30
body:
Here we are, dear reader, still trapped by others' support of the status quo.

We cannot escape our crapitalistic enslavement as long as the morons refuse to [read books.](https://theanarchistlibrary.org/library/petr-kropotkin-mutual-aid-a-factor-of-evolution)

Escaping their indoctrination is not a viable option to them, just ask one.
They are quick to deny your theories can be correct.

Why folks would rather continue to act to their own detriment rather than get out of line is beyond me.
~110 years ago the '[founding fathers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Voltairine_de_Cleyre)' [wrote it down.](http://www.anvari.org/fortune/Miscellaneous_Collections/361833_o-long-as-the-people-do-not-care-to-exercise-their-freedom-those-who-wish-to-tyrranize-will-do-so.html) 
But, I have never been good with conforming for the sake of popularity.

Not much point in it, when you are born to lose.

Even if I were to cut my hair, I still wouldn't get a real job because every crapitalust can read my contempt for the system.
T

author: freebornangel
title: What a Wonderful Wednesday!
body:
I hope your's is going well, dear reader, I am enjoying mine from the comfort of a 65f degree day.

I think winter will finally get here on Friday.
They are saying rain turning to ice and/or snow.

Won't that be wonderful?

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/fYmMHah8-image.png)

I'm hoping to be here at the library long enough for the front to come through.

It really is a trade off.
Cold north wind pushing me home, warm south wind kicking my butt.

Such are my first world problems.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/6c916BaE-image.png)

Looks pretty bleak [on the radar,](https://www.accuweather.com/en/us/national/weather-radar) no sign of a wind change, yet.

[The wind map](https://earth.nullschool.net/#current/wind/surface/level/orthographic=-98.44,37.01,1137) is showing some hope of a change, but it is still a few hundred miles north and west of here.

Guess I will just have to gut it out on that next to last hill.
It always hurts, jus
root_title: What a Wonderful Wednesday!

author: freebornangel
title: Do you follow the moon cycles?
body:
I try to keep an eye on the sky.

I don't know if it is random chance, or good prognostication, but since I started minding which side of the moon was in the sky at night things have been going pretty steady.

No big changes.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/k9MHFauz-image.png)

The wisdom says that making decisions should be done on the waxing side of the moon.
Planting crops, new beginnings, etc.

I have noticed that the bad side of the moon is when most depressing things happen, for me.
If I am going to lose, it generally happens after the full moon.
The closer I am to the new moon, the greater the degree of loss.

You, of course, have to evaluate your own data.

https://www.farmersalmanac.com/calendar/moon-phases/#01092020

While you are there, sign up for their newsletter to get free wisdom in your inbox.

https://www.farmersalmanac.com/blog

They would be real get, if we could get them on steem.

I'm afraid my persona may scare them off, dear reader, maybe  you can
root_title: Do you follow the moon cycles?

author: freebornangel
title: Steem on!!  You can't do it wrong!
body:
Even if you just post a pic of you in the backyard and bid bot it to the top of trending.
It is okay to do that!

I don't know why folks get so emotional about how they steem.
It's like they have a little prison guard in their minds to remind them that they are not free.

## If you want to post a pic of your cat, do it!

# If you want to post a pic of your latte, do it!

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/TqvTJjes-image.png)

Make a meme!
Make some coffee.
Make yourself happy.
Nobody else can do it for you.
Happiness is homemade.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/xXDFreIB-image.png)

Ok, Ok, I get it.
You are not happy with the rewards that the community is voting to you.

Not alot I can do about that, my .02stu vote is pointless, in most economies.

Even if my vote was to go back to the .25stu it once was, all the other votes will go up, too!
The popular people will still be more popular than the unknowns.

title: SPS and vote penalty curves.
body:
Gotta lower that stuff.

It's been a few months since we ran off most of the little people with the bitch slap of penalizing small accounts in the curation math.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/NzCG9gvC-image.png)

I get why that had to happen, it was needed to stop the spam accounts from growing so fast before @steemflagrewards could catch them and get them on a downvote trail.

If you are not following a sfr trail, or delegating to them, what is wrong with you?
We have to adult here, if we want this to succeed.
Abuse has to be flagged.

We do this each Tuesday, on average, and each Tuesday, up to this point, we have failed to bring the keep working stop paying plan to fruition.

They think that they are free, but they are only free to do what is allowed.
If they got out of line, all hell would break lose, if only in their own minds.
Most are not capable of even imagining freedom, at this point.

If we all got out of line on the same day, maybe a Tuesday, there would be little that anybody could do about it.

Do you really expect the biddies in the gated communities to get their hands dirty by manning the walls?
Perish the thought.
They leave all that dirty work up to their men and sons, mostly.

author: freebornangel
title: Who the hell is 'Q'?
body:
Thanks go to [Lew Rockwell](https://www.lewrockwell.com/)!
He does news while claiming to be an anarchist.


[From the story:](https://www.americanthinker.com/articles/2020/01/an_introduction_to_q.html)

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/SlHNt6UZ-image.png)

>Who is Q? 
What is Q? 
And, perhaps most importantly, why is Q?  
Q and the ever-growing worldwide movement it’s inspired have been the objects of fascination, mockery and hatred, but of surprisingly little serious analysis.

>Q first appeared in October 2017 on an anonymous online forum called 4Chan, posting messages that implied top-clearance knowledge of upcoming events. 
More than 3,000 messages later, Q has created a disturbing, multi-faceted portrait of a global crime syndicate that operates with impunity. 
Q’s followers in the QAnon community faithfully analyze every detail of Q’s drops, which are compiled [here](https://qmap.pub/) and [here.](https://qanon.pub/)

[con't](https://www.americanthinker.com/articl
root_title: Who the hell is 'Q'?

author: freebornangel
title: What is Mutual Aid?
body:
The videoninjas at [sub.media](https://sub.media) have made a short video to help introduce statists and other authoritarians to the idea that we will do better if we cooperate rather than eat each other.

I know the voice in your head is telling you that you need to get back into the safe areas where big bro is gonna save us, but you really will like it better on the other side, imo.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/KVn7ziXz-image.png) 

https://youtu.be/oRvX0abNWvg

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=what+is+mutual+aid

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PopmGAvsggg


https://youtu.be/lfkZJDxC-YY
(Stem content) ^^^

https://youtu.be/jytf-5St8WU

I hope you take the time to watch some of these videos, you will come out the other side with an altered perspective.
Knowledge is like that, until you know what you don't know, you can't know that you don't know it.

This fact blinds many people to the escape hatch.

Let's try to not let that be us, eh?
root_title: What is Mutual Aid?

author: freebornangel
title: Superior people have nothing to prove.
body:
In fact, they diminish their superiority by doing so.

Think about it, dear reader, if you have to prove that you are superior then isn't your superiority already in doubt?

Shouldn't it be self evident?
There shouldn't be any question, in my mind, anyways.
If you were superior, all would see it.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/R7SnuDg3-image.png)

You gotta decide for you.

Me?
I'm just gonna do what I do, like I have been for some years now.

It seems to work best, for me.

If you like what I do, then give a fella some attention.
Tell your friends.

If you don't like what i do,...

# mute me!

You will be in the company of many folks just like you.

title: Crisper Babies!

author: freebornangel
title: What is going on with trending?
body:
Is it just me or are the payouts unusually low?

Have communities allowed high value posts to go mia?

Why are low value posts, <10stu, even on trending?
![3HaJVw3AYyXBBQkN3tCkhE2EjPPNPEEY7rZsT4k8E4aPBLjjU4T3hN4b4jQMDrkJW4bFBpk6VQNnCRorJ9SRv2EVFFappYsihzYSxHL.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcEnDrjxpaVPwchhnrpeNbcpSf5S1efoc6sqtfxzVhmfN/3HaJVw3AYyXBBQkN3tCkhE2EjPPNPEEY7rZsT4k8E4aPBLjjU4T3hN4b4jQMDrkJW4bFBpk6VQNnCRorJ9SRv2EVFFappYsihzYSxHL.png)

Have antiabuse efforts finally won the tug of war on the pool?

Is more stake sitting idle?

I can't tell that my vote is any larger, as would be the case if significant stake went idle.
Payouts at the bottom would widen, too.

The top ten votes take 25% of the pool. (Source:  @statsmonkey)
And, those top value accounts get 9 more votes each.
Steem is a commons, don't you know?

Steem really needs to finish its transition from top accounts creating bag holders to top accounts looking for long term value.

Clearly, the plan, for over two years, was strip as much va
root_title: What is going on with trending?

author: freebornangel
title: Ohh,....look, a keyboard!
body:
Can I milk out another crap post?

Gee, it appears that I can.

I got a few minutes on a keyboard, and narrowly dodged crapitalism today, so I figure I should make this post.

I'm not totally sure that I dodged crapitalism's pull back into wage slavery, but I should know in a couple days.

Until then I will have to fall back on my ability to hold together a contextually coherent conversation with whatever brilliant people decide to spend their time reading what I have to say, textually.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/HbzlQdYl-image.png)

http://facebook.com/proclaimation 

Since this is going to end abruptly, I figure I should babble on until the keyboard master returns to his precious.

What do you think?

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/KQXoYXWm-image.png)

I joined the crypto generation today by spreading out my holdings into more baskets.
I guess we will find out at some point whether I got it done at the right time, or not.

W
root_title: Ohh,....look, a keyboard!

author: freebornangel
title: What is going on with Brave and Threespeak?
body:
![Screenshot_20200211-234554.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmesZkwTKJLTVau5QFfmdu6Ugn7BGNjA3kecj9xqx83TJ8/Screenshot_20200211-234554.png)

When i first tried using @threespeak in brave, it wouldn't work.
Took me a bit to try dropping the fingerprinting shields.
Apparently, Threespeak does something that conflicts with that particular shield.

I turned it off because tokenbb and steemconnect both conflict with that shield, and if you want to use them, turning off fingerprinting protection is a must.

So, everything was fine, then, some days ago, something changed and threespeak no longer loads.

What gives, @threespeak?

![3HaJVw3AYyXBBQkN3tCkhE2EjPPNPEEY7rZsT4k8E4aPBLjjU4T3hN4b4jQMDrkJW4bFBpk6VQNnCRnZqK2byi3ouxMgBvEX2LdjoTU.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdv89wmUv2zPEVK4iVbMPjDzKnDkoPLaLWk4gk3VViYWx/3HaJVw3AYyXBBQkN3tCkhE2EjPPNPEEY7rZsT4k8E4aPBLjjU4T3hN4b4jQMDrkJW4bFBpk6VQNnCRnZqK2byi3ouxMgBvEX2LdjoTU.png)

author: freebornangel
title: Freedom Tuesday #32
body:
Well, the weather has cleared up a bit.
I was able to make it to a keyboard that didn't come with a leftist over my shoulder making clucking sounds.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/sVEQE1Bt-image.png)

## Lucky you, dear reader!

I know I sometimes get a little wrapped up in things that really touch close to my center of being.

One of those is when you mess with my income.
Stinc has been doing that, literally, for years.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/EaXLasWV-image.png)

It is not the first time they sold us out to 'investors' for the sake of stripping more btc from what we do here.

I doubt that @ned dumped all his stake.
He intentionally obscured what stake was his when we moved to force his hand last time.

I'm gonna bet that it will take several years to get rid of the stakeholders that are currently selling for pennies.
It's all found money to them.

author: freebornangel
title: Misfits, right at home on steem!
body:
## Misfits, those that don't fit into twitsterville or fedbook are embraced with open arms on steem!

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/qZrBGCGg-image.png)
[source](https://thebasebk.org/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/emma_goldman_quote_2.jpg)

Most of the people I have found here fit right in.
The crowd welcomes them with open arms despite their idiosyncrasies.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/3hIXhSdX-image.png)

We take the less popular, the misfits, the average people and give them a welcoming place to be.

Or, we did up to this point.
What happens in the next few hardforks is open to speculation, but the community we have built will likely remain cordial to most.

## It is what makes steem a community.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/QTa6y3Ec-image.png)

Only a certain few of us try to force the class war onto our amalgamation, we know who they are, and we think less of them them than they think
root_title: Misfits, right at home on steem!

author: freebornangel
title: One steem, one vote.
body:
For witness voting.

Got 30m steem?
Vote it all on one witness, or 1m on 30 witnesses, up to you.
We should have done this already, IMO.

Along with down votes for witnesses and vote decay to force a dead man's switch onto witness voting.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/bT0y7ize-image.png)

Making the witnesses stand for election twice a year appeals to me, too.

I mean good luck getting anything into a hardfork now that doesn't involve the death of the chain, what with what tron has already said.

## Tron steem, anybody?
![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/KH2TuDpG-image.png)

We will be lucky to maintain the status quo.
Which was working just fine, imo.

Now we got all this uncertainty, and certainty that stinc doesn't act in our best interests, to deal with.

Just when I was ready to give stinc the benefit of the doubt again, ned does this to us.
Smdh.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/duZUvJdh-im

But, as I am not, it will be up to me to convince  you, that you should join me in my endeavor to drive up the price.

author: freebornangel
title: Steem proof of keys, and devotion to the chain, day!
body:
Do you hold steem on an exchange?

It is really silly, if you do, but don't actively trade it.

Your steem could be earning sp inflation adjustments, curation rewards, fighting abuse, and safe, but instead you store it on the exchange.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/j4mwyxmP-image.png)
[List of failed exchanges.](https://bravenewcoin.com/insights/36-bitcoin-exchanges-that-are-no-longer-with-us)

I mean, the first lesson behind back up your keys, is keep your coins off exchanges and in a wallet with backed up keys.

You could really do us all a favor if you went to the btm and put in some dollars and pulled some steem off the exchanges and into your wallet.

Once we chase off all the dumpers, the price will rise.

If nobody sells below the price we find consensus at, then we will have a good thing here.
Until then, look to do this for pennies, if that.

![image.png](https://files.steempeak.com/file/steempeak/freebornangel/xlVz4vji-image.png)

It is up to you, and me, to
